message: Bob, I believe this product would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm initially offering it for $1,500,000.
Alice, that's a bit steep for me. I see the value, but I'd be willing to pay $800,000 for it.
Bob, I understand your position, but the value of this product is truly significant. I could come down to $1,300,000.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me.  While $1,300,000 is closer, I'm still only comfortable at $900,000.
